Author: velocity2ds
Text: Tysm!! I have had relapse moments but usually in the form of doing c&s again. But you are very true like totally overhauling your mental relationship with food and your body is a long hard process

Author: avoao
Text: Thanks so much for sharing! I'm really proud of you too, and I'm so glad you're getting better and you're happier. Remember that recovery takes a long, *long* time and it's so okay to lapse or even relapse on the way. You're doing amazing, and just be sure to keep all this positivity in mind when you find you're not doing so well sometimes! Again, I'm so so proud of you ðŸ’— I hope you're having a great day today!
